overview: Only the dry wind in the wilderness is waiting for the hero to visit again seven years later. This is a wonderful natural paradise in childhood memories, this is the first date, the place where the name is carved on the stone. Today, things are different, time is as quiet as the sea. There is only the sound of the wind here. Facing the sadness agitated by the past and the future, the young people snorted tiredly after playing. At the same time, several other young people have passed the last period of restlessness in their youth.
title: The Sound of Silence
